content: / needle c cup repeat round 2 another 24 times or amount to equal 6 diameter across = 84 sts 28 sts / needle d cup repeat round 2 another 26 times or amount to equal 6 5 diameter across = 90 sts 30 sts / needle e cup repeat round 2 another 28 times or amount to equal 7 diameter across = 96 sts 32 sts / needle purl 2 rounds these two rounds help define the edge as you begin to create the back of your knocker inner piece abbreviations round 1 knit to last 2 sts k2tog each needle co cast on round 2 ssk knit to last 2 sts k2tog each needle kfb knit into front & back of stitch repeat rnds 1 & 2 until 12 sts remain 4 on each needle k knit cut yarn leaving a long tail thread tail through remaining p purl stitches and leave opening loose to allow for stuffing m1 make one increase fill with fiber fil™ and pull closed weave in ends k2tog knit 2 stitches together ssk slip two stitches from left to right as if to knit * optional nipple work 4 row of i-cord stretch and twist then knit them together through the back loops i-cord tightly and stitch down to create a very small nipple for a pattern using magic loop or crochet or to make a donation visit www knittedknockers org
